comment.author: 29191863@N03
comment._content:
I was excited to see this photo you have of the 1904 Presidential Election memorabelia...
The reason for my interest is that I have in my posession a Republican Candidates silk Ribbon embroidored with T. Roosevelt and V.P. Fairbanks likeness.  I found a record of one such ribbon in a Antiques and Collectables Book, but so far have been unable to find any other record of the same ribbon... I have also looked through Cornell's Library 1904 Items. Can you give me any info on how common a find this ribbon is or where I may be able to find such info...
Thank you,
KK
